## Check my pyarrow

::: {.cell execution_count=1}
``` {.python .cell-code}
# python
import sys
print(sys.version)
print(sys.executable)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
3.9.12 (main, Apr  5 2022, 06:56:58) 
[GCC 7.5.0]
/home/danielle/miniconda3/bin/python
```
:::
:::


::: {.cell execution_count=2}
``` {.python .cell-code}
# python
import pyarrow
pyarrow.__version__
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=2}
```
'8.0.0'
```
:::
:::
